Producer: Ashok Amritraj, Ramin Bahrani, Kevin Turen, Justin Nappi
Production Co: Hyde Park Entertainment, Noruz Films, Broad Green Pictures, Treehouse Pictures
Rating: R (Language|A Brief Violent Image|Some Sexual References)
Synopsis: A desperate construction worker (Andrew Garfield) reluctantly accepts a job with the ruthless real-estate broker (Michael Shannon) who evicted him and his family from their home.
Title: 99 Homes
